page.title: 15RELIGION
page.content: Having studied 5 churches in the area, these are the differences discovered. ST.DENY'S, ROTHERFIELD. Mr. Hayllar is vicar of this 12th C Anglican church. 285 regular worshippers attend 16 services a week.The Parish extends from Red Gate Mill to Jarvis Brook and Stone Gate Mill to Town Row. METHODIST. Mr. Hyde is the minister of this church.90 regulr followers attend the one Sunday service in this 110 year old church. ST.MICHAEL'S, JARVIS BROOK.Rev,Jenkins is Rector of this 60 yr.old church which is similar to St.Deny's except slightly smaller. ROMAN CATHOLIC.Father Slaughter is the minister of the 1964 church. STRICT BAPTIST. Mr. Woodhams baptises people by total immersion in water.The church is quite small.
